DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study explore effect ferment papaya preparation ( FPP ) whole body inflammation , physical function , fatigue , health-related quality life . The investigator conduct double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled pilot study FPP old adult . If FPP find beneficial impact systematic inflammation study population ( adult age 70-100 year old ) , supplement may potential treatment option combat aging .
